title: Where the location of the plot abuts a nallah, the marginal open space along the nallah shall not be insisted upon beyond 6 m from the edge of the trained nallah
clause_text: Where the location of the plot abuts a nallah, the marginal open space along the nallah shall not be insisted upon beyond 6 m from the edge of the trained nallah.
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Where the location of the plot abuts a nallah, the marginal open space along the nallah shall not be insisted upon beyond 6 m from the edge of the trained nallah.
